data.title: Characterize RLM information loss by type

data.body: Instrument the RLM sub-LLM to capture its output at each compression cycle. Diff against ground truth to measure what types of information decay fastest: phone numbers, relationships, quantities, temporal ordering, etc. We already proved RLM drops early facts (budget + project lead lost on Early Fact Recall). This task systematically categorizes the loss. Cheap to run — just add logging to the existing benchmark harness and run across all 8 scenarios.
